RelatedSentence: A fire at the La Quinta Inn on South Colorado Boulevard forced guests to evacuate early Monday morning .
About 42 firefighters attacked the fire that started just after 3 a.m. at 1975 S. Colorado Blvd .
The fire started in a unit and spread to the roof , crews told 7NEWS Reporter Lindsay Watts .
The fire appeared to be out at 4:15 a.m. , Watts reported .
